products.title: Origin, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: This time in warm oak, the origin range delivers high quality basswood slats sourced from ecologically responsible forests. The blind comes with a matching pelmet, bottom rail, and acorns for a slick and streamlined aesthetic. Add some natural style to even the most contemporary of settings by including the warm oak in an all-white bedroom, using the blind and wooden furniture to provide the only colour in the room.

products.title: Origin, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline. With everything in life taken care of at its own speed, all that is left for you to do is lie back and take in the unique aesthetic as you get the rest and relaxation you have been searching for. The perfect blend of sleek finish and gentle colouring. Origin, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline.

products.title: Origin, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sleek and elegant in jet black, the origin's african blackwood offers streamlined modernity yet with all of the quality and practicality of real wood. Their basswood is sourced from ecologically responsible, sustainable forests, and provides a high standard of finish. For the ultimate in contemporary style, feature the african blackwood amidst a sunny yellow scheme, painting the walls to contrast with the ebony tone.

products.title: Origin, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: Solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home. To accent the subtle colour we have crafted light and finely honed wooden slats that hang effortlessly in any space. Perfect for adding that gentle atmosphere of relaxation that makes a house a home. Origin, solitaire - venetian blind solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home.

products.title: Origin, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the subtle stylings of this unique tone to create a visual that will live long in the memory. Origin, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey from the origin range is a light contemporary tone that allows you to add a depth of colour to any space without sacrificing your light and airy look and feel.

products.title: Origin, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: Classically elegant, the origin in old walnut displays a dark-toned finish on the responsibly sourced basswood typical of this range. A heavy duty headrail is specially designed to hold the weight of the wood and all components are formed from high quality materials. Mix the traditional with the contemporary by including the old walnut in a modernly styled dining room, blending with pale sage walls and white trim.

products.title: Origin, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space. The earthy quality of the colour is matched beautifully by the minimalist finishing of the slats to create a simple yet striking visual that captures the eye the moment you enter. Origin, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space.

products.title: Origin, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple in colour, the origin bright white is just as sleek and streamlined in design. Thick wooden slats, formed from ecologically managed basswood, accompany high quality components in matching white, so that you can be sure of a coordinated look offering style and coherency. The bright white will look simply striking against almost any bolder colour, but for a traditionally coastal colour scheme in the bathroom, why not team with bright teals and aquas? Keep the base of the room white and use the gorgeous green-blues to accessorise.

products.title: Kolsva, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality and style, the kolsva sheesham contains superior, basswood timber sustainably sourced from conservational forests. The quality crafted louvres, in a sophisticated walnut shade, sit on adjustable mechanisms that allow you to alter the angle of the blind for all of your privacy, ventilation, and shading preferences. Create an elegant dcor scheme in your lounge by resting the sheesham against lavishly textured wallpaper with cocoa hues and delicate detailing.

products.title: Kolsva, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Adorn your windows in superior, basswood timber with the kolsva wengi, using sustainably sourced wood from conservational forests. Featuring craftsman-built louvres and modern components to allow you to regulate the room with your shading and privacy likings, this stylish window dressing provides character and vogue. Use the deep shade of the wengi to create a compelling scheme in your lounge, with similarly toned wooden features and a contrasting ivory and burgundy palette.

products.title: Kolsva, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an elegant window covering with value, choose the kolsva tawny oak with its high quality standard and sustainably sourced timber. The authentic louvres and modern components allow you to create a sophisticated style, with the added practicality of ventilation and shading flexibilities. Fashion a vibrant and inspired tribal theme in your lounge by hanging the tawny oak against a burnt orange backing, with opposing cream.

products.title: Kolsva, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you prefer an authentic window dressing with traditional style and practicality, choose the kolsva sycamore for its sustainably sourced timber and quality standard. Presenting naturally toned basswood louvres, that are quick and easy to install, with modern components, it allows you to adapt it to your privacy and shading preferences. For an elegant dcor scheme with a restful feel, use the sycamore in your bathroom to take advantage of its anti-cracking and anti-warping quality.

products.title: Cotswold, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

products.title: Kolsva, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kolsva pale oak brings a touch of the natural world inside your home in a truly timeless way. With the gentle ebb and flow of the grain set against a warm and cosy shade you'll be able to sit back and relax as you appreciate the finer things in life. Turning the guest bedroom into the home away from home that your guests will never want to leave is all about adding those homely touches that put them at ease.

products.title: Cotswold, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

products.title: Cotswold, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

products.title: Cotswold, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

products.title: Cotswold, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

products.title: Cotswold, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the gentle fizzle of the colouring and the assortment of accompanying fixtures to create a unique visual that is truly something to savour. Origin deluxe, champagne - venetian blind champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast. Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features. Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats. Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers.

products.title: Cotswold, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor. Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings with it a sense of balance and poise that will allow you to add new depth and character to your decor in an instant. Origin deluxe, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement. Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones. Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look. Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? By offering you something you won't see everyday it allows you to take your decor in a new direction by opening your eyes to what is possible when you fuse design and functionality in perfect harmony. Turning the living room into your own little oasis away from it all is about setting the tone when it comes to colours.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of naturally toned timber with matching pelmets and rails creates a compelling feature that allows flexibility to suit your shading and privacy preferences. As the tawny oak features a quality, anti-cracking and warping component, fashion a distinctive dcor scheme in your kitchen, with similarly shaded surfaces.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjoy a calming natural colour that accentuates the free-flowing beauty of wood grain. There's nothing better than a lounge that allows you to switch off and put your feet up is there? With pale oak hanging with pride in your window you'll be able to create a theme with nothing more than a lightly coloured rug and matching ceramic table lamp.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style. Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics.

products.title: Kalmar, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar ridgeback is a subtly layered design that weaves woody browns and light stone greys together in perfect harmony. By finishing things off with light grey dashes that amplify the natural backdrop of the wooden grain it allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Turn the living room into the relaxing and homely space that you've always wanted by building your new colour scheme out from your windows.

products.title: Kalmar, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: A lighter finish always adds a more contemporary feel to a wood, and the kalmar in spanish cedar brings a classic edge through textured grain and a gentle polish. With high quality parts, and durable basswood, this blind also offers practicality by the bucketload. Finish off a clean and contemporary kitchen, with just a hint of country style, by incorporating the spanish cedar. White units will pair beautifully with wooden worktops, in a similar finish to that of the blind, and a refreshing duck egg blue will offset the look nicely.

products.title: Kalmar, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Kalmar, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style. Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.
